participant_1.background:
I try to do laundry once or twice a week.
i love going to the movies.
my mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside.
i am short.
my father used to be a butcher.

participant_2.background:
I am not married because I am still trying to find my soulmate.
I enjoy painting, but I could never be a painter if I were blind.
i can be quite forgetful.
I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
I spend my day reminiscing about my childhood and cherishing the close bond I have with my family.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm a bit short, but I love going to the movies. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, but I'm a bit forgetful so I can't always remember all the details. I'm also working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. How about you?
That's awesome! I'm trying to do laundry once or twice a week, but it's a bit hard to keep up with. I also love going to the movies and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a busy schedule! I'm sure you're doing a great job. What's your favorite movie?
I love all the Marvel movies! I'm also a big fan of the Harry Potter series.
I've been meaning to watch the Marvel movies, but I haven't had a chance yet. I love Harry Potter too!
They're so good! I'm really excited for the new movie coming out this year.
Me too! I'm also excited for the new Fantastic Beasts movie.
I haven't seen the first one yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
It's really good! You should definitely see it.
I'll have to check it out.
